a situation in which something becomes greater or more serious: It's difficult to explain the recent escalation in/of violent crime. Price escalations for building materials caused the project to be cancelled. See
escalate
More examplesFewer examplesEscalation in the cost of library materials has continued to outstrip budgets.Your contract could include an escalation clause to account for price increases. Both sides have agreed to talks to prevent a further escalation of violence.
